title: The most affordable digital cameras by average price
summary: This statistic shows the Average of affordable price in cameras and provincial by in The price .
62.3 affordable price were classified as Sigma in cameras by in The price .
gold: The graph shows that Memoto has an average price of £ 70 . The Sigma is priced slightly lower at around £ 62 but the Cambo is more expensive at around £ 76 . The Hunten is a cheaper camera at around £ 58 and the Konica is the cheapest at £ 54 .
